snippet.title: Borders Indie Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the art installation at:
http://www.gonzzink.com/portfolio/borders

You can download the game for free and or donate at:
http://gonzzink.itch.io/borders

Borders is a political art game created not only to exhibit video games as an art form but to portray the dangers Illegal Mexican immigrants face in order to give the next generation a better future. Players attempt to cross the border while avoiding La Migra (border patrol) and staying hydrated. The place where every player dies is permanently recorded into the video game’s world, represented by a skeleton. This universal symbol communicates where players should be careful as well as simulates the large death toll claimed by Mexico’s deserts.

My first indie game I have ever created working as the Artist, Creative Director, Art Direction, and Animator. http://www.gonzzink.com

Jon DiGiacomo - Engineer, Level Designer

Genaro Vallejo Reyes - Game,Level, and Sound Designer

Made in a 7 day long gamejam with two first time game developers, Gonzalo and Jon,and 1 veteran, Genaro
